__e: Good old Watson, no, no, no, no.

If I'm right, Watson, everything we want it to.
Sweetie, what happened with you and Miss Watson is all in the past, okay?
She's a detective now, Watson, so she's one of us.
- That's not the John Watson I know.
Though in my opinion it comes more into Doctor Watson's line than ours.
Um, the other day, you told Watson that I had not been to any of the meetings at St. Luke's that whole past week.
Right after Watson and I examine the rest of the house.
